about_mission: NeoWealth's mission is to break down the barriers to startup investing. By leveraging the power of Neo Coin and blockchain principles, we are creating a transparent, secure, and globally accessible ecosystem where innovators can connect with investors to build the future.
about_vision_text: We envision a world where anyone, anywhere, can invest in the next big idea with confidence and ease. A future where funding is not limited by geography or traditional financial systems.
faq_a1: NeoWealth is a decentralized platform for investing in startups using Neo Coin (NEO). It aims to make startup investment transparent, global, and secure through blockchain principles.
faq_q2: How do I connect my wallet?
faq_a2: Click the 'Connect Wallet' button in the header. This is a simulation, so it will automatically generate a mock wallet with a NEO balance for you to use on the platform.
faq_a3: In this demonstration, all data is stored locally in your browser, simulating blockchain logic. In a real-world application, all transactions would be secured on the NEO blockchain.
faq_q4: Can I list my own startup?
faq_a4: Yes! Sign in as a 'Startup Founder' to get access to the founder dashboard, where you can add and manage your startup listing.
greenvolt_desc: GreenVolt Energy is dedicated to providing affordable and sustainable solar energy solutions to underserved communities. Our innovative panel technology maximizes efficiency in diverse climates, bringing power to remote areas and reducing carbon footprints globally.
biotrace_slogan: AI-driven cancer detection from saliva samples.
biotrace_desc: BioTrace is revolutionizing early cancer detection. Our proprietary AI algorithm analyzes biomarkers in saliva samples to identify early-stage cancers with unprecedented accuracy. Our mission is to make diagnostics non-invasive, accessible, and life-saving.
neopay_slogan: Blockchain-based microloan network for small merchants.
neopay_desc: NeoPay MicroFinance empowers small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) by providing a decentralized platform for microloans. By removing traditional intermediaries, we offer lower interest rates and faster access to capital for merchants worldwide.
edusphere_slogan: Personalized AI tutoring for global learners.
edusphere_desc: EduSphere AI is an adaptive learning platform that provides personalized tutoring to students of all ages. Our AI analyzes learning patterns to create custom study plans, exercises, and interactive lessons, making education more effective and engaging.
